Sapher Shield: Click-by-Click Protection Against Scams and Hackers

What is Sapher Shield?
Sapher Shield is your personal cyber-guard that checks every website, link and attachment for legitimacy. Just as you'd want someone to warn you if you're about to trip over something, Sapher Shield alerts you before you accidentally share information with scammers, download a malicious attachment or spend on a fraudulent website.

Sapher Shield Offers Users
24/7 protection without affecting device performance

Constantly updates with the advanced cyber intelligence to catch new scams that slip past standard security

Simple set up - installs in minutes 

Multiple device protection: one account can protect all your browsers.

Scenarios We Prevent
Accidentally buying from fake shopping sites

Entering card details on convincing but fraudulent payment pages

Downloading harmful files disguised as important documents

Sharing personal information on phishing sites

Shop, Click, and Browse Without Second Guessing
Every day, we’re exposed to over 130 potential threats through web browsing alone. With 20-40 emails landing in your inbox daily, it only takes one convincing scam to slip through. In 2023, Australians lost over $477 million to online scams, and 1.8 million people experienced card fraud - that's nearly 1 in 10 Australians.

Modern scammers use AI and sophisticated tools to:

Create perfect copies of legitimate websites

Launch new scams faster than security updates can track

Design personalised phishing attempts that look exactly like real emails

Build fake shopping sites 

Hide malicious content inside safe downloads.

Real Time Protection for Today’s Online Threats
Most people think they're protected because they have antivirus software and use a VPN or their browser's built-in security. Here's why that's no longer enough:

Antivirus Software

Only detect threats after they're widely known

Can only perform clean up after detecting an attack

Updates are often behind new scams

Focuses on malware but misses modern social engineering tricks

Can't protect against fake websites that look legitimate.

Browser Security

Only blocks known dangerous sites

Can't detect sophisticated phishing attempts

Misses scams that are just hours old

Doesn't protect against misleading payment pages

Can't verify if links in emails are safe. 

Virtual Private Network (VPN)

While a VPN protects how your data travels, it can't prevent you from: 

Downloading a malicious link

Shopping on a fake website and inadvertently sending information to criminal sources

Malware or ransomware from infecting your device

Protect your accounts if your login credentials are compromised.

How Sapher Shield Meets These Security Gaps
Proactive Protection

Checks every site as you visit it

Verifies link safety 

Validates payment pages before you enter personal details

Real-Time Defense

Uses advanced, live threat intelligence to catch brand new scams

Adapts to new threats as they emerge

Detects suspicious patterns even on never-before-seen sites

Smart Prevention

Recognises fake versions of legitimate websites

Identifies scam patterns that bypass traditional security

Alerts you to potential risks before you share any information.

Comprehensive Coverage

Protects against phishing attempts

Guards against fake sites

Prevents accidental information sharing

Stops malicious downloads before they start.

Don't wait for your antivirus to tell you that you've been compromised. 
Let Sapher Shield protect you from the start.
Getting Started is Simple
Add Sapher Shield to Chrome

Create your account (just name and email required)

Start browsing with confidence

We don't collect your browsing history or personal data - we're here to protect your information, not gather it.

The Sapher Shield Difference
While banks might reimburse you for fraud, they can't give back the hours spent fixing your accounts, updating your logins, and dealing with compromised personal information. Sapher Shield prevents these headaches from happening.

Take action before you get scammed. Join the thousands of Australians who browse without nagging doubts, knowing Sapher Shield is checking every click.

# Protect Yourself from Online Scams with Sapher!
Did you know Australians lost an estimated $2.2 billion to credit card fraud last year alone? This alarming figure highlights the everyday risks of being online, the unforgiving nature of hackers, and who they choose as their victims.
When individuals fall victim to card fraud, they face financial losses, unauthorised charges, and potential disruptions to their credit history. In severe cases, it can lead to identity theft, causing further financial and personal complications.
With Sapher, you can navigate the digital landscape with confidence. Our advanced protection system proactively monitors suspicious activity and real-time analyses of online behaviour.

# Secure Your Online Experience with Sapher
Sapher's browser extension is more than just protection—it's your proactive shield against cyber threats. Seamlessly integrated into any browser on any device, it prioritises your safety without slowing you down.
Sapher detects and blocks phishing attempts, fraudulent websites, and other cyber threats, acting as your digital guardian and ensuring that your data remains yours.

# Easy Installation Steps:
1. Sign up for Sapher
2. Download the Chrome or Safari extension
3. Login to your Sapher account
4. You're all set! Stay protected wherever you browse.

Say goodbye to worries about online scams:
- Defends against scams and phishing attempts across all websites and links, including those received via email, text messages, and advertisements.
- Ensures your information remains confidential and secure, protecting you from potential identity theft and financial losses.
- Actively monitors for threats and preemptively safeguards your online activities and personal data.
- Notifying you immediately when a potential threat is detected provides peace of mind with every click.

Install Sapher today and enjoy a Sapher Click every time.
